Thirty years ago, Rene Higuita wrote his name into folklore with a scorpion-kick save for Colombia against England at Wembley.

items.text_for_match: Levy exits role as Tottenham executive chairman Daniel Levy has left Tottenham after almost 25 years as executive chairman of the Premier League club. Daniel Levy has left Tottenham after almost 25 years as executive chairman of the Premier League club.
